text: __NOTOC__ Year 270 (CCLXX) was a common year starting on Saturday of the Julian calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Empire ==== * Emperor Claudius II Gothicus dies. He is succeeded by his brother Quintillus. * Quintillus commits suicide. He is succeeded by Lucius Domitius Aurelianus. * Aurelianus pushes the Goths back across the Danube and recovers Roman land. * The Romans leave Utrecht because the Germanic tribes keep fighting. * Crisis of the Third Century: An economic crisis starts in the Roman empire. === By topic === ==== Technology ==== * The Chinese invent gunpowder. At first, it appears to be used only for fireworks. == Births == * November 20 - Maximinus II, Roman Emperor * Nicholas of Myra (Santa Claus) (d. 343) * Rabbah bar Nahmani, Babylonian 'amora * Saint Spyridon, bishop of Trimythous (d. 348) == Deaths == * St. Valentine (executed by Claudius II) (Possible year) * Claudius II, Roman Emperor (b. 213) * Quintillus, Roman emperor * Plotinus, father of Neo-Platonism (b. c. 205) (approximate date) * Jingu of Japan, possibly legendary empress of Japan * Luo Xian, general of the Kingdom of Shu * Qiao Zhou, minister of the Kingdom of Shu (b. 201) Category:270
